Class PasswordResetServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.cafe.backend.service.impl.PasswordResetServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PasswordResetService
@Service public class PasswordResetServiceImpl extends Object implements PasswordResetService
PasswordResetServiceImpl is a service class that implements PasswordResetService. It provides methods to handle the generation, validation, retrieval, and deletion of password reset tokens.

This service class interacts with the PasswordResetTokenRepository to manage tokens for password resets, including checking token expiration and associating tokens with users.

    • validatePasswordResetToken

      public boolean validatePasswordResetToken(String token)
      Validates the provided password reset token.
      Specified by:
      validatePasswordResetToken in interface PasswordResetService
      Parameters:
      token - the password reset token to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the token is valid (i.e., not expired), false otherwise.

    • getUserByToken

      public UserEntity getUserByToken(String token)
      Retrieves the user associated with the provided password reset token.
      Specified by:
      getUserByToken in interface PasswordResetService
      Parameters:
      token - the password reset token.
      Returns:
      the UserEntity associated with the token, or null if the token is invalid.
